after 1700 hours getting roasted by toxic russians, i can say its pretty good.

It is a good game, makes fun, especially with friends :) 
the uprank system is kinda trash, but if u focus on having a good time with your lads, u regret nothing.

It can be frustrating and lousy to eat insane headshots and maybe meeting some hackers, but i guess every game has its own problems. 

The community is also very kind but on the other hand toxic and salty af.

Download it and try it out :D it's your own journey to find it out.

5.A 6 year old kid who slept with your mother

11/10 would play again
